Introduction


Se So Neon (Korean: 새소년; Japanese: 新しい男の子) is an indie rock band managed by Magic Strawberry Sound. They formed in 2016 and debuted in 2017 under BGBG Records with the single "A Long Dream" from their first EP "Summer Plumage".
